name: Sex Slave
description:
Do you love adult sexy mystery stories. Do you love beautiful girls. Do you desire to control them and their every move. Then this game is made just for you. Grab your copy now and let the controlling begin.
You are serial killer who has kidnapped three women. One dies and the police come to your house. What are you going to do? A thrilling adventure game for mature users. CONTAINS ADULT CONTENT. NO FOR UNDER 18s.

adventure
